biography_text: ALLRED, Colin, a Representative from Texas; born in Dallas, Dallas County, Tex., April 15, 1983; graduated from Hillcrest High School, Dallas, Tex., 2001; B.A., Baylor University, Waco, Tex., 2005; J.D., University of California, Berkeley, Calif., 2014; professional athlete; nonprofit executive; lawyer; staff, United States Department of Housing and Urban Development, 2016-2017; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
